item.title: Kali Linux
item.description: Some rambling (I guess)… Been a while and I’ve been busy with other projects, but getting back into my routine. I wanted to talk a little bit about Kali and why I think people are stupid with their negative opinions on it. There is some stupid egotistical thinking on the web that using an OS like Kali for Pentesting/hacking makes you a skid and an idiot or something like that. There are posts like this one that is not only showing a lack of brain cells, but shows ignorance: https://forum.
